unnormalised: Subsidy programs in India, like those for fertiliser, require careful evaluation. Impacts on fiscal deficit need assessment. Consider effects on states like Kerala, especially during Onam. Alternative delivery mechanisms, perhaps DBT, deserve exploration. A complex issue!
